sel.constants



enum size_t NODE_BUFFER_SIZE;
Size of the buffer for the SEL protocol (hub-node communication). Some inbound packets may be very large.

Default:
8192

enum size_t POCKET_BUFFER_SIZE;
Size of the receive buffer of the Minecraft: Pocket Edition's handler. It should be slighly bigger than the default mtu used by the game to avoid the allocation of unused memory.

Default:
1464

enum size_t POCKET_TIMEOUT;
Default:
12

enum ubyte[] MOJANG_PUBLIC_KEY;
Mojang's 120-bytes public key used for the login packet encryption.

enum int MINECRAFT_BACKLOG;
Default:
64

enum string WEB_COMPRESSION_FORMAT;
Compression format for web resources. Valid values are "gzip" and "deflate".

Default:
gzip
